segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, completely oblivious to the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, forming a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on drying that plate, almost like she's in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny, actually, how absorbed she is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will say something to her about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is quite amusing, but also a bit worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR
